item.title: Linear model and t test
item.description: 1. A brief description 2. Recent Applications 3. References 1. A brief description This post will summarize the advancement of using R to analyze data obtained in behavioral and relevant areas. 2. item.title: R Used in Literature
item.description: 1. A brief description 2. Recent Applications 3. References 1. A brief description This post will summarize the advancement of using R to analyze data obtained in behavioral and relevant areas. 2. Recent Applications Use null model to do the statistics (Benitez & Saffran, 2018) str(Cnd_Prdct) ## 'data.frame': 30 obs. of 1 variable: ## $ Prop: num 0.396 0.701 0.61 0.558 0.425 ... Prop <- Cnd_Prdct$Prop ptp <- car::powerTransform(Prop) summary(ptp) ## bcPower Transformation to Normality ## Est Power Rounded Pwr Wald Lwr Bnd Wald Upr Bnd ## Prop 1.
